sn55.47:1.2: Ekamantam nisinnam kho nandiyam sakkam bhagava etadavoca:
sn55.47:1.3: “catuhi kho, nandiya, dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako sotapanno hoti avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano.
sn55.47:2.2: Idha, nandiya, ariyasavako buddhe aveccappasadena samannagato hoti—
sn55.47:2.3: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.47:2.6: ariyakantehi silehi samannagato hoti akhandehi …pe… samadhisamvattanikehi.
sn55.47:2.7: Imehi kho, nandiya, catuhi dhammehi samannagato ariyasavako sotapanno hoti avinipatadhammo niyato sambodhiparayano”ti.
